properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT COU_DATE FROM TB_COU_TIME WHERE COU_NO = ?
SELECT TIME_NO, COU_NO, COU_TIME, COU_DATE FROM TB_COU_TIME WHERE COU_NO = ? AND COU_DATE = ? AND COU_TIME NOT IN( SELECT RES_TIME FROM TB_COU_RES WHERE COU_NO = ? AND RES_DATE = ? ) ORDER BY TIME_NO
INSERT INTO TB_COU_REV VALUES ( SEQ_COU_REV_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )
SELECT REV_NO, COU_NO, NICKNAME, REV_CONTENT, CR.CREATE_DATE, COU_SCOPE FROM TB_COU_REV CR JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE COU_NO = ? ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
